title: Only in NA do people complaint in player behavior
body:
Because it's only NA players that get punished.

I went to Mexico last year and played games in the latin american server, out of 10 games i was toxic in all of them and didnt EVEN get a chat ban, now, <removed by moderation>, it's only NA that players get punished for typing in chat.

PROOF: in South Korea server players normally afk and let the enemy team run down mid, that's where the 'open mid' came from.

Why only NA? because we're the capital of complaining, NA blames their lossess in games to toxicity., NA has the most toxic players/complainers so...

NA DESERVES PERMABANS, and they should be more strict, <removed by moderation>

replies.body:
I think every region has a player behavior board. 

I've removed part of your comment as you're not allowed to encourage others to break in-game rules, nor are you allowed to insult others on the boards.

If you have any questions about this moderation, feel free to reach out to us in the [Boards Discord](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/community-moderation/7rtKBZLi-boards-moderation-discord-verification).
What the hell? You can literally open euw boards and see people complaining.

> [{quoted}](name=SonicAF,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=a7Mr3en8,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-12-07T13:41:23.745+0000)
>
> What the hell? You can literally open euw boards and see people complaining.

Complaining about chat related punishments? Iirc "kys" is not even zero tolerance in that region.

> [{quoted}](name=R107 Games,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=a7Mr3en8,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2018-12-07T14:25:17.428+0000)
>
> Complaining about chat related punishments? Iirc "kys" is not even zero tolerance in that region.

That would be because it's the Danish spelling for 'kiss'.

> [{quoted}](name=R107 Games,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=a7Mr3en8,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2018-12-07T14:25:17.428+0000)
>
> Complaining about chat related punishments? Iirc "kys" is not even zero tolerance in that region.

Not only it is, it's also censored on the boards. It says %%%.
You mean it's mainly NA players complaining on the NA board? Genius! Next you're going to tell us how the floor gets slippery when it's wet.

I mean we ARE the biggest community.

and the most annoying.
Indeed, NA is a sensitive region
